About Avaal Institute

Avaal Institute is a premier coaching center in Pathankot, dedicated to providing high-quality education for competitive exams and computer skills. Under the expert supervision of Prof. Gourav and Prof. Rajat, we have helped hundreds of students achieve their career goals.

Our institute offers specialized coaching for SSC GD, MTS, Punjab Police exams, along with comprehensive computer courses including Fundamental Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Python programming, and Tally with GST.

We believe in personalized attention, practical learning, and result-oriented teaching methodologies that empower students to succeed in their chosen fields.
